## ShaderFramework.getWorldNormal() method

Gets the varying input value of type vec3 which holds the world normal of current fragment

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getWorldNormal(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The world normal of current fragment

## Remarks

This function can only be used in the fragment shader
